**Contract Description:** The Government of Canada, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is seeking proposals for the acquisition of a Vibratory Polisher Machine for the National Research Council of Canada’s (NRC) Energy, Mining and Environment (EME) Vancouver branch. The purpose of this tender is to obtain a Vibratory Polisher Machine capable of preparing samples for Electron Backscatter Diffraction (EBSD) characterization.

**Notice:** The solicitation reference number is WS3728267742-Doc3731336359. Bidders are advised to visit the specified notice URL for more information regarding this tender opportunity. All bids must be submitted electronically in accordance with the instructions provided.
